name: ember-mcp-tool-server
description: MCP stdio server for Ember AI On-chain Actions tools for LLMs

scripts.build: tsc && node -e "const { join } = require('path'); const fs=require('fs'); const p=join(process.cwd(),'dist/index.js'); if(fs.existsSync(p)){ fs.chmodSync(p,'755'); }"
